title: Class of 1967 50-year Reunion Gift Fund
description: To provide for a commemorative bench on the University of Colorado Boulder campus.  Any remaining funds will support Koenig Alumni Center capital improvements.
marketingContent:
This fund has been established on behalf of the 1967 50-year Reunion Planning Committee for the purpose of giving the university a class gift commemorating the occasion. Funds will be donated to the Koenig Alumni Center for the installation of a commemorative bench in their newly renovated back yard. Funds raised above the total cost of the commemorative bench will be allocated to other future Koenig Alumni Center improvements or beautification efforts.

Help the class of 1967 leave a lasting legacy by donating to the class gift!
